content: materials aran yarn grey dark red white beige 3 5mm crochet hook stitch markers and pins yarn needle stuffing stitch knowledge required single_crochet = single_crochet slip st = slip_stitch invdec = single_crochet decrease through back loops only decrease = single_crochet decrease blo = back loops only ** = a repeating stitch pattern measurements the completed piece measures approx 28 cm tall
